title: Silencing Worker Voices
headline: Contract Workers Feel Like They Can't Speak Out
description: It usually starts with a three-to-six month contract, but contract workers can be let go at any time without reason; their managers at the tech company are empowered to end contracts at their own discretion. The uncertainty of their job security and power dynamics within their team often leads to contract workers keeping silent about discrimination, abuse, or any other harms they experience on the job.
